message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) because it deals with the semantic orientation of words and its application in text classification, text filtering, and analysis of survey responses. It could also belong to Information Retrieval (cs.IR) because it deals with tracking opinions in online discussions. Additionally, it could belong to Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) because it proposes a method for automated measurement of semantic orientation. Finally, it could belong to Cybernetics (cs.CY) because it deals with automated chat systems (chatbots).
